body.p: Also in response to the global financial crisis, in April 2009 the FASB issued FASB Staff Position (FSP) No. FAS 157‑4 Determining Fair Value When the Volume and Level of Activity for the Asset or Liability Have Significantly Decreased and Identifying Transactions That Are Not Orderly. That FSP was codified in Topic 820 and provides guidance for:

li.p: measuring fair value when the volume or level of activity for the asset or liability has significantly decreased; and
identifying circumstances that indicate a transaction is not orderly.
